name: Mars Blitz
description:
Rescue your crewmates while fighting aliens from mars!

In the year 2041, the first mars expedition takes place, after you and your crew arrive, you stumble upon what appears to be an alien structure. Suddenly, you find yourself inside what appears to be some sort of capsule, after you manage to get out of it, you realize you’re in the structure you had found before and so you decide to search for the rest of your crew.

Features:

  • Fluid shooting mechanics
  • Different aliens to encounter
  • Various collectibles to find
  • Cute characters!

Controls:

  • Aim: Mouse
  • Shoot: Left Mouse Button
  • Interact: E
  • Move: WASD

Credits:
